title: Sekai Wa Kimi De Mawatteru
alternative_title: 世界は君で廻ってる ; 世界因你而转动 ; Sekai wa Kimi de Maewatteiru ; The World Is in Your Arms ; The World Revolves Around You
status: 世界は君で廻ってる ; 世界因你而转动 ; Sekai wa Kimi de Maewatteiru ; The World Is in Your Arms ; The World Revolves Around You
description:
Description :
        From Yaoi Is Life: "Maki-kun, you really are cute!" That's what my very good-looking classmate Fukamachi said to the definitely plain looking me. Since then Fukamachi kisses me, touches my skin, and follows me around. Even if I run away or cry, he chases me persistently, eventually even doing indecent things... An average guy with a beauty complex getting agitated by a good-looking guy in the title story, and other short-stories which hadn't been published till now, are collected in this anthology. Newly drawn pictures are also included.
